channel.title: 667+ website hiscores and Donator/vote system help
channel.description:
So I am looking for some help with making my hiscores work with a webhost I have.. so far it works fine except I cant seem to get the players to show up on the table no idea whats going on.. I host the server on my other pc but have the hiscores on a webhost... I have been told use a remotesql thing but I dont have that option with my webhost sooo XD
Also I am looking to add in a donor/vote system but am not sure what to do with 667s+ when it comes to those to get them working correctly.(tbh I havent looked much into those yet*)
Any help would be appreciated. ^-^
Rev.667 src.poanizer/extinction/zenith/mine

item.title: 667+ website hiscores and Donator/vote system help
item.dc:creator: @syzygy syzygy
item.description:
@syzygy wrote:

yeah they said i need to pay for the feature to be enabled… was wondering if there would be another way but apparently not.

Read full topic

item.title: 667+ website hiscores and Donator/vote system help
item.dc:creator: @Adam200214 Adam200214
item.description:
@Adam200214 wrote:

If you can’t allow you’re servers ip through remote mysql then i’m sure you can’t do it, and if you’re using a paid webhost i would advise you move :L

Read full topic
